DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine response rate elderly patient metastatic colorectal cancer treat fluorouracil-uracil leucovorin calcium ( Orzel ) . II . Evaluate toxicity profile regimen patient population . III . Compare response rate obtain study observe recent phase III study young patient . OUTLINE : Patients receive oral fluorouracil-uracil oral leucovorin calcium ( Orzel ) every 8 hour 28 day . Courses repeat every 35 day absence unacceptable toxicity disease progression . Patients follow every 3 month 2 year , every 6 month 3 year , annually thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 20-55 patient accrue study within 1 year .
